code: var padToTwo=function padToTwo(number){return number<=9?"0"+number:number;};export var displayTime=function displayTime(centiseconds){var minutes=0;var seconds=0;if(centiseconds<0){centiseconds=0;}if(centiseconds<100){return"00:00,"+padToTwo(centiseconds);}var remainCentiseconds=centiseconds%100;seconds=(centiseconds-remainCentiseconds)/100;if(seconds<60){return"00:"+padToTwo(seconds)+","+padToTwo(remainCentiseconds);}var remainSeconds=seconds%60;minutes=(seconds-remainSeconds)/60;return padToTwo(minutes)+":"+padToTwo(remainSeconds)+":"+padToTwo(remainCentiseconds);};
